# RunLoop.SchedulerTimeType.Stride

**Structure**

The interval by which run loop times advance.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Stride
```

## Creating Scheduler Time Strides

- **init(_:)**: Creates a run loop scheduler time interval from the given time interval.

## Inspecting Stride Properties

- **magnitude**: The value of this time interval in seconds.
- **timeInterval**: The value of this time interval in seconds.

## Working with Scheduler Time Intervals

- **advanced(by:)**: Returns a run loop scheduler time calculated by advancing this instance’s time by the given interval.
- **distance(to:)**: Returns the distance to another run loop scheduler time.

## Conforms To

- AdditiveArithmetic
- Comparable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByFloatLiteral
- ExpressibleByIntegerLiteral
- Numeric
- SchedulerTimeIntervalConvertible
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SignedNumeric
